name: Aid It!
description:
Aid It!

In collaboration with the British Red Cross, we have created a prototype game in a 7 hours Game Jam.  A Smart phone friendly game that introduces basic first-aid techniques to players. 

Concept

Inspired by the classic electronic toy - Bop It! We have designed a simple prototype where the players will have to go around a park and encounter different emergency situations. Then they will have to perform simplified first-aid tasks to help the people in need. 

Different to  prototype, our concept would be a time based game and players are required to react quickly in order to save as many people as possible. This allows players to memorise all the different steps while quickly reacting to different situations.
